chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_0 p) a -> exists b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b /\ prec_occur p b

Premises:
ad = N : Set
upl_conv_0 = fix upl_conv_0 (p : prec_list) : prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a p0 p1 => prec_cons (uad_conv_0 a) (upl_conv_0 p0) (upl_conv_0 p1) | prec_empty => prec_empty end : prec_list -> prec_list
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
uad_conv_0 = fun a : ad => match a with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~0 end : ad -> ad
upl_conv_0_occur_in_img : forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_0 pl) a -> exists b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b
upl_conv_1_occur_in_img : forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_1 pl) a -> exists b : ad, a = uad_conv_1 b
prec_occur_ind : forall P : prec_list -> ad -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> P pl0 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> P pl1 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> P p a
adcnv_disj : forall a : ad, exists b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b \/ a = uad_conv_1 b
adcnv_inj0 : forall a b : ad, uad_conv_0 a = uad_conv_0 b -> a = b
prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
upl_conv_0_occur : forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_0 pl) (uad_conv_0 a) -> prec_occur pl a
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
adcnv_ok : forall a b : ad, uad_conv_0 a <> uad_conv_1 b
adcnv_inj1 : forall a b : ad, uad_conv_1 a = uad_conv_1 b -> a = b
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
u_merge_0r : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s -> forall b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b -> MapGet state (udta_conv_0 p0) a = Some s
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
upl_conv_1_occur : forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_1 pl) (uad_conv_1 a) -> prec_occur pl a
u_merge_1r : forall (p0 p1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (u_merge p0 p1) a = Some s -> forall b : ad, a = uad_conv_1 b -> MapGet state (udta_conv_1 p1) a = Some s
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
N.lxor_comm : forall a b : N, N.lxor a b = N.lxor b a
upl_conv_0_img_0 : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), upl_conv_0 p = prec_cons a la ls -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0 /\ a = uad_conv_0 a0 /\ la = upl_conv_0 la0 /\ ls = upl_conv_0 ls0
upl_conv_0_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> pl_tl_length (upl_conv_0 p) n
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_contained_ind : forall P : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P p p) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> P p p1 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> forall p p0 : prec_list, prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0
upl_conv_1_img_0 : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), upl_conv_1 p = prec_cons a la ls -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0 /\ a = uad_conv_1 a0 /\ la = upl_conv_1 la0 /\ ls = upl_conv_1 ls0

```coq
intros p a H.
apply prec_occur_ind with (P := fun pl b => exists c : ad, b = uad_conv_0 c /\ prec_occur pl c).
- intros a pl0 pl1. exists a. split. auto. apply prec_hd.
- intros a b pl0 pl1 H0 H1. destruct H1 as [c [H2 H3]].
   exists c. split. auto. apply prec_int0 with (a := a) (pl0 := pl0) (pl1 := pl1); auto.
- intros a b pl0 pl1 H0 H1. destruct H1 as [c [H2 H3]].
   exists c. split. auto. apply prec_int1 with (a := a) (pl0 := pl0) (pl1 := pl1); auto.
apply H.
Qed.```

original: intros p a H. apply prec_occur_ind with (P := fun pl b => exists c : ad, b = uad_conv_0 c /\ prec_occur pl c). - intros a pl0 pl1. exists a. split. auto. apply prec_hd. - intros a b pl0 pl1 H0 H1. destruct H1 as [c [H2 H3]]. exists c. split. auto. apply prec_int0 with (a := a) (pl0 := pl0) (pl1 := pl1); auto. - intros a b pl0 pl1 H0 H1. destruct H1 as [c [H2 H3]]. exists c. split. auto. apply prec_int1 with (a := a) (pl0 := pl0) (pl1 := pl1); auto. apply H.
